From: Chris Burdess <dog@...>
Subject: More on versioned resources
X-Yahoo-Group-Post: member; u=270091071

I've been reflecting a little on this issue with versioned resources and
the fact that a straightforward PUT would not be idempotent (or at least
not exactly), but a PUT-302-PUT combination involves sending the content
payload twice (a nasty shock for the author wanting to upload her 1GB
video file).

Is it possible to use the Expect mechanism to avoid having to send the
payload for the first PUT? If so, what would the dialogue look like,
would it involve a 302 or a 417 response, and can you even have a
Location header with a 417 response?
-- 
Chris Burdess
